//Tabla que muestra el progreso de isoTracker import "./progressTable.css" const ProgressTable = props =>{ var headers, progress //Si el user es admin muestra mas informacion if (props.user === "admin"){ headers = Progress Progress ISO Real progress Real progress ISO progress =
40%
50%
80%
60%
}else{ headers = Progress Progress ISO progress =
40%
50%
} return ( {headers} {progress}
); }; export default ProgressTable;
